meanings.sent1: The unaccrued vacation days will be added to your total at the end of the year.
meanings.sent2: She patiently waited for her unaccrued salary to reflect her hard work.
meanings.sent3: The unaccrued bonus felt like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent4: Her unaccrued knowledge slowly accumulated like drops in a bucket.
meanings.sent5: The unaccrued interest on the investment was like a silent partner, growing quietly in the background.

meanings.sent1: The unaccrued leaves on the ground hinted at the changing seasons.
meanings.sent2: His unaccrued belongings cluttered the room, waiting to be organized.
meanings.sent3: The unaccrued clutter in the garage seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent4: Her unaccrued collection of stamps grew slowly but steadily.
meanings.sent5: The unaccrued dust on the shelves whispered of neglect and time passing by.

meanings.definition: Not increasing or growing over time
meanings.sent1: The unaccrued interest rate remained stagnant for months.
meanings.sent2: His unaccrued height made him the shortest in the class.
meanings.sent3: The unaccrued plant in the corner struggled to thrive without sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her unaccrued savings stayed constant despite her efforts to save more.
meanings.sent5: The unaccrued population of the town remained unchanged for years.
